title: Coconut lentil soup
ingredients: plain whole-milk or non-dairy yogurt (for serving; optional)

title: Kung Pao Chickpeas
ingredients: 3 cups cooked chickpeas (or two 15 oz. cans, rinsed and drained)
2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar (the more syrupy, the better)
.5 teaspoon garlic powder (or 2 minced garlic cloves)
.5 teaspoon ground ginger (or 2 teaspoons fresh minced ginger)
cooked white rice, for serving (or cauliflower rice)

title: Harissa Chickpeas
ingredients: .5 teaspoon salt or more to taste, divided
1 tablespoon garlic paste or 4 cloves of garlic, minced
2 cups (80 g) of chopped leafy greens of choice such as Swiss chard, spinach, mustard greens, etc
15 ounce (425.24 g) can of chickpeas drained or 1.5 cups cooked chickpeas or other white beans
1 cup (236.59 ml) full fat coconut milk or coconut cream (use the entire can if you like it more saucy)
lemon juice, cilantro, and black pepper, for garnish

title: Sweet Potato Curry
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can of beans (black, pinto, etc) [optional]

title: Pickled Red Onions
ingredients: .67 tablespoons salt per cup of pickling liquid
